name: Social Anxiety (Lin Augustine)
description:
You play as someone who has social anxiety so severe that it causes recurring nightmares. In between the nightmares, you take a peek at their diary to learn about their life beyond the dreams.

There are 5 levels.

Controls:

  • Movement: left/right/up arrows (up = jump)
  • Previous diary page: left arrow
  • Next diary page: right arrow or spacebar
  • Button press: spacebar
  • Esc to pause or exit

Art: 1-bit pack by Kenny https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Sounds/Title Music: Free Sounds Library https://www.freesoundslibrary.com/
(Most where gotten from here but I also made some myself)

Game Info: This game was made in 35 non-consecutive hours for Miz Jam 1 using the Godot game engine. Feel free to download and take a look at the source code if you like, but I've only been working with godot for like two weeks so you're probably better at making games than me lol!

Update: After first uploading the game, I updated it a couple hours later to fix some issues in level 3 as well as increase the knockback a bit.
